configureIndicatorExtraction.START_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Optimize your threat management with the Indicator Extraction Configuration widget in FortiSOAR. This tool lets you customize indicator extraction by excluding specific indicators, reducing false positives and improving threat analysis efficiency. Key features include custom exclusions, streamlined threat detection, and adaptability to evolving security needs.
configureIndicatorExtraction.EXCLUDELIST_CONFIG_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Specify artifacts that should be excluded from enrichment and further analysis.
configureIndicatorExtraction.EXCLUDELIST_CONFIG_PAGE_IP_ADDRESS_TOOLT: Specify IP addresses to exclude from enrichment.
configureIndicatorExtraction.EXCLUDELIST_CONFIG_PAGE_URL_TOOLTIP: Specify URLs to exclude from enrichment.
configureIndicatorExtraction.EXCLUDELIST_CONFIG_PAGE_DOMAIN_TOOLTIP: Specify Domains to exclude from enrichment.
configureIndicatorExtraction.EXCLUDELIST_CONFIG_PAGE_PORTS_TOOLTIP: Specify Ports to exclude from enrichment.
configureIndicatorExtraction.EXCLUDELIST_CONFIG_PAGE_FILES_TOOLTIP: Specify Files to exclude from enrichment.
configureIndicatorExtraction.EXCLUDELIST_CONFIG_PAGE_CIDR_TOOLTIP: Specify CIDR Ranges to exclude from enrichment.
